Package com.prc.alp.liaison.interact

Provides facilities for creating and engaging in interactions involving the transfer or exchange of information with external agents.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CloneableInteractor An interactor that can safely clone itself on demand.
Interactor Defines and implements the behavior associated with a particular kind of Interaction between an ALP/Cougaar agent and one or more external agents.
MultithreadInteractor An interactor that needs to be manipulated through some other thread besides that of a particular Interaction.
 

Class Summary
ActionType Defines the allowable types of actions within interactions and their generic results.
CoABSDefaultInteractionFactory An InteractionFactory that is invoked by default for CoABS Grid messages received when no other InteractionFactory agrees to handle them.
CoABSDefaultInteractor This default interactor is used by the CoABSDefaultInteractionFactory.
CoABSLookupInteractor A manager of interactions involving the CoABS Grid Jini registry lookup service.
CoABSRegistryInteractor A manager of interactions involving registration with the CoABS Grid.
Interaction An independent thread of activity involving the exchange of information between an ALP/Cougaar agent and one or more external agents.
InteractionFactory An on-demand generator of Interaction objects.
InteractionResult Uniquely classed objects that allow the specific action methods of an Interactor to identify whether their execution was successful.
RETSINAUnexpectedWxInteractionFactory An InteractionFactory that is invoked by default for RETSINA InfoAgent messages received when no other Interaction agrees to handle them.
RETSINAUnexpectedWxInteractor This default interactor is used by the RETSINAUnexpectedWxInteractionFactory.
RETSINAWeatherInteractor An interactor that knows how to request weather information from selected RETSINA weather InfoAgents.
 

Exception Summary
ActionTimeoutException Created whenever a single action step within an interaction exceeds a pre-specified time limit for that particular action.
InteractionTimeoutException Created whenever a single action step within an interaction exceeds a pre-specified overall time limit for that entire interaction (when the interaction as a whole has exceeded its time limit).
 

Package com.prc.alp.liaison.interact Description

Provides facilities for creating and engaging in interactions involving the transfer or exchange of information with external agents. Interactions may be synchronous or asynchronous, and they may be based upon a message passing model, a service invocation model, or other more specialized or customized models. A generic, state-based Interaction engine is the focal point of control. Management of specific types of interactions is regulated by specializations of the Interactor interface.
